abstract: James Woolery, co-head of North American mergers and acquisitions at JPMorgan Chase, will join the Cadwalader, Wickersham & Taft firm as deputy chairman. That will leave Chris Ventresca as sole head of the JPMorgan unit.
snippet: James Woolery, co-head of North American mergers and acquisitions at JPMorgan Chase, will join the Cadwalader, Wickersham & Taft firm as deputy chairman. That will leave Chris Ventresca as sole head of the JPMorgan unit.
lead_paragraph: 8:32 a.m. | Updated with memoOne of JPMorgan Chase’s most senior deal makers is heading back to the practice of law.

headline.main: A JPMorgan Deal Maker Is Returning to the Law
headline.print_headline: A JPMorgan Chase Deal Maker Is Returning to the Law

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
